name: PopStory
description:
PopStory is a game created on Unity between february and may 2021.

The project was a collaboration between Game Programmer and Game Designer in group of 7 (2 programmer and 5 Designer) and we had to create a 2,5 D game on Unity. PopStory is the result of that Project, its a Puzzle Game where you incarn a little character made of paper who will have to evolute in different level.

Credits:

        -Designers:  Lucien Parent-Santarelli; Sofian Haquin; Justin Léger; Malo Guyon; Benjamin Lagache

        -Programmers: Camille Launay; Lancelot Maréchal
